channel.title: Floor Items
channel.description:
Hey, I have just been nosing through moparscape server downloads, I found a post with floor id's, object ids, etc.
I downloaded the floor ids list, and I was wondering... How can I add them to my server? Because I want to add ice pebbles to my flooring - and as its not a object I don't know where to add it.
Note: I do [b]not[/b] use a client! Please help! ;) [b]Help most appreciated[/b]
If anyone knows, I will really appreciate for you too tell me :) Thank You - [b]DJ Whizz[/b][br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 01, 2008, 12:25:47 pm[/size][hr]BUMP Anyone help?

item.title: Floor Items
item.dc:creator: @DJ_Whizz DJ Whizz
item.description:
@DJ_Whizz wrote:

Hey,
I have just been nosing through moparscape server downloads, I found a post with floor id’s, object ids, etc.

I downloaded the floor ids list, and I was wondering… How can I add them to my server?
Because I want to add ice pebbles to my flooring - and as its not a object I don’t know where to add it.

Note: I do not use a client!
Please help! Help most appreciated

If anyone knows, I will really appreciate for you too tell me
Thank You
